question: What is the main business sector your company operates in (e.g. manufacturing, retail, farming, etc.)?
Consider about  last 12 months, how would you describe your business state?
Looking forward to the next 2 to 3 years, what is your expectation regarding  marketing of your products or services?
Overall, how would you describe your target of your business over the next 4 to 5 years?
What do you feel about your biggest obstacle in achieving your business objective?
